item.title: Helpful links
item.description: List of links pertaining to eclectic areas of interest: Special Mentions John Kitchin’s DFT book Andrew White’s Deep Learning for Molecules and Materials Notebook Fundamentals of Data Visualization Linear Algebra + Stats Khan Academy Lectures 3Blue1Brown’s Essence of Linear Algebra Series Intuitive guide to Linear Algebra StatQuest Calculus 3Blue1Brown’s Calculus Series Khan Academy’s Multivariate Calculus Data Science Blogs Nate Silver’s 538 Pudding’s data viz Spurious Correlations Understanding uncertaintly Math3ma Blog Learning Python Automate Boring Stuff with Python Scientific programing with Python Visual Guide to Numpy Project Euler Github Repo for Projects Python DataScience Handbook Chris Albon’s notes ML + Datascience: Hands-on Machine Learning Jakevdp Python Datascience Notbook Cool visual intro to ML Blog entry for Deep learning crash course Distill Blog Cool Courses: Harvard’s CS 109 Stanford’s CS - CNN course MIT’s Intro to Deep Learning Google’s ML crash course Deep learning for molecules NYU’s PyTorch Deep learning CMU’s course on Computer Graphics MIT’s course on Computational Thinking YouTubers List of YouTuber channels that never fail to inspire me
